name: When Charmony Rings Out...
introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
● After completing the Trailblaze Mission "The Return," you can directly activate Trailblazer: Harmony in the "When Charmony Rings Out..." event page.
● If you have already activated Trailblazer: Harmony, this will automatically convert to 1 Shadow of Harmony, which can raise Trailblazer: Harmony's Eidolon Level.
